page.title: 14HANDBELL RINGERS (cont.)
page.content: Nowadays, most of the team of ringers are young girls. They have a leader, and practise a few weeks before Christmas.They work very hard on Christmas Eve, Christmas Day and all the Christmas season, and all the visitors look forward to their coming.Over the years they have raised thousands of pounds- last year alone they raised over a thousand pounds. Handbell ringing is a very interesting art; it takes a lot of skill to keep the tune and rhythm going, and you have to work very closely with the rest of the team. The tradition has continued for many years now, and last year the bells were re-toned. Many girls from Elmslie School have been in the team, and I hope I will soon be able to join them. { }
